title: Search for Delicious Recipe
full_text:
Search for Delicious Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
3 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
3 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
Cynar
1
ounce
Punt e Mes
1/4
ounce
fresh juice
from
1
whole
lemon
2
dashes
orange bitters
Pinch
kosher salt
Directions
In an Old Fashioned glass, stir Cynar, Punt e Mes, lemon juice, and orange bitters with a large ice cube until chilled. Add salt on top of ice and serve.
Special equipment
Mixing glass
